TopicTitle: Particles for decouplers loop in VAB?

Articles.Content:
Every time I use decouplers in the VAB, they loop their decouple effects. Help? It also happens on the launch too.

![Pg0tQ6m.png](http://i.imgur.com/Pg0tQ6m.png)
It's been a while since I've heard of this one, but it was caused by an addon if I remember right, what have you got installed AstroGamer?

It also won't decouple when In flight. It just removes the fairing for the heatshield and the everything but the command pod are uncontrollable,

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> It's been a while since I've heard of this one, but it was caused by an addon if I remember right, what have you got installed AstroGamer?

One second, I just need to check

- - - Updated - - -

CKAN says I have 45 MODS. But I am running KSP 64bit using the workaround (that isn't the reason, I have used it before) Most of the are just one mod, but here goes.

> 
> Ambient Light Adjustment
> 
> Environmental Visual Enhancements
> 
>  *Astronomer's Pack*
>

>

Sorry to bump. What I mean by uncontrollable is the engines won't throttle and I can't check the fuel. Sorry for such an unexplained description. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
I saw someone saying TweakScale was the problem, but it wasn't. Help? (sorry to bump)
I'm stumped sorry, If I were you I'd look through my mods for any that change decouple effects first, and see what happens when they are uninstalled.

> 
> I'm stumped sorry, If I were you I'd look through my mods for any that change decouple effects first, and see what happens when they are uninstalled.

I posted my mods list a bit back in this post.

> 
> I'm stumped sorry, If I were you I'd look through my mods for any that change decouple effects first, and see what happens when they are uninstalled.

Also, I don't think I have any decoupler changing mods.
Try tweakable everything, or it might be a graphical mod depending if the decoupler effect has been changed at all.

> 
> Try tweakable everything, or it might be a graphical mod depending if the decoupler effect has been changed at all.

I already have that.

> 
> No I meant removing it...

Ohhhh. XD Ok, I'll do that.

- - - Updated - - -

It worked! Thank you! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
